title: TK TV
description: Do you have a dream of appearing on TV? Ever wished you could be the star of your own programme? Are your acting and marketing abilities up to par? You have a platform to fulfill your fantasies and steal the show, thanks to TK TV!
registration: The event comes under general registration.
rules: This event comprises two rounds - Prelims (Channel Surfing) and Finals (Adzap).
Usage of mobiles and other electronic gadgets is strictly prohibited.
Vulgarity in any form will lead to elimination.
Expressing any sort of opinion on politics, religion and other sensitive topics is not allowed.
Participants will have to switch channels upon the judges’ command.
The specific channel to be re-enacted will be mentioned by the judges, on the spot.
Only Tamil and English-language channels will be a part of this event.
The topic will be given on spot.
Time allotted for preparation is one minute.
Participants must perform for at least 2 minutes.
